storyInfo:
Wei Yenwu's calculations and ruthlessness are terrifying, but evident are his qualifications as the Chief of Lungmen.
Rhodes Island chooses to continue to cooperate for its own goals.

attributes.content: 4:45 AM \ Clear
L.G.D. Headquarters Rooftop Ruins, Upper Lungmen
Madam Ch'en, I believe Amiya is right next to you. Can you hear me?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Yes, Chief Wei.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Very well then.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I must apologize, leader of Rhodes Island. Though I can risk sending the L.G.D. deep into enemy territory, I can't risk bringing any more players into this game.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.options: Bringing more players in?;...What do you mean by that?;The situation out there is already chaotic.

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Beneath this entire land lies an invisible, yet intricate net.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: No single city can break free from this net of conspiracy and intrigue - and especially not Lungmen, as it is situated in the midsts of giants.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Perhaps you already know this, perhaps you don't. Nevertheless, I have to take all these factors into consideration.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Chief Wei, you should have shared this information with us if you wanted our mission to progress more smoothly.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: At least, you should have told me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I must apologize yet again, Miss Amiya. From my position, I simply cannot disclose all our intel.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: If you were standing in my shoes, you would have made the same decision.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: What happened in the Chernobog ruins was a pity, but at least you achieved something.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You used us to draw Reunion's attention.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: No, the L.G.D. was right there with you.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.options: You used all of us as bait.

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: He planned for all this a long time ago.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Reunion's infiltration only deepens as time passes, so he had to quickly make a decision.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: At the most crucial moment, when Reunion was most vulnerable...
Rhodes Island was made to draw their attention.

attributes.content: He led Reunion to believe that the L.G.D. had been separated—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: ...and fooled them into thinking that Lungmen was undefended.

attributes.content: Hah, well said, Dr. {@nickname}! Chief, of course you'd need us to hold Reunion back. The more the better, right?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: When the lurking Reunion saw Lungmen in such a state, there's no way they wouldn't spring at the opportunity.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: And as soon as they began to emerge from their lairs, then BAM! Lungmen's elite forces would be waiting for them, seemingly out of nowhere.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: How long have you been concealing Lungmen's power? Did you already start preparing for this after the Chernobog incident?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Lungmen kept you safe, and helped you return to a position that could maximize your value.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You left Amiya to die back there in the middle of so many enemies. What kind of 'position' are you talking about?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I just hope that Rhodes Island can understand that we all have to face this difficult situation together.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Miss Blaze, Dr. {@nickname}, it's fine.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Miss Swire helped us to defeat Reunion's forces, together. Lungmen did not abandon us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (We don't have any proof.)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Tch...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Our agreement is still valid. No matter what happened during the process, only the end result can satisfy me.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: No matter what happened.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname} of Rhodes Island, I believe I made myself clear the last time we met.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You do not have a choice in this matter. But at least you can choose how you eliminate your enemies.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.options: I don't believe you or the snake oil you peddle.;...;Nobody will happily smile and go on their way after being deceived.

attributes.content: Isn't that for the best?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: We should all stay alert. Nobody should let their guard down when we are facing a common enemy.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Your vigilance can keep you from falling into a trap.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Listen, Dr. {@nickname}—
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: ...We may not be friends yet, but at least we are not enemies.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: So, silence is your answer.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: A fine display of judgment. You would hide your weaknesses while pressing your advantages.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Rhodes Island indeed is a powerful partner. You have earned my recognition from this incident.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But, this comes on the condition that our relationship is still a partnership, not a statement of the status between illegal Infected and local authorities.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I do not intend to fool anyone.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Though, objectively speaking, I may well have fooled Reunion.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But none of that can be proven. Reunion may also have access to our secrets.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: We can only hope to destroy them before they come to grasp our strategies.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: So, does this goal motivate you at all?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Miss Amiya, Dr. {@nickname}, the cooperation between us has not ended yet.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: A counterattack is imminent. We will demonstrate Lungmen's stature, wisdom, and unity to them.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: If possible, I would also like to witness Rhodes Island's professionalism, resolve, and bravery.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: In fifteen minutes, Madam Ch'en will return to fight at your side.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Mister Wei, I hope you don't forget what you just said.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Because Rhodes Island will not.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Naturally.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Blaze, Dr. {@nickname}, let's go.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah, by the way, Madam Ch'en, where's Inspector Hoshiguma? I don't see her around. Is she... all right?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She had some minor injuries, nothing serious.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh, I see...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Madam Ch'en, Rhodes Island can also give you a checkup and provide some quick treatment if needed.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No thanks.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You don't have to worry about anything, our medical procedures are completely confidential.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A little bit of elbow grease is good enough.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Mm... If you insist, then I won't force you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In that case, I'll see you later then, Madam Ch'en.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: 5:00 AM \ Clear
Chief's Office, Upper Lungmen
Chief Wei, how was everything on your end?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Good, of course. Otherwise, I wouldn't have time to chat with you here.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Did they agree to slow down the operation?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Of course, but there is a time limit.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Today, and tomorrow. If Reunion is still not contained after two days, you know what will happen.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Only two days?! That's not enough time! I can’t—
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Two days and nights are already too generous. In comparison, I will only give you one day.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: One day?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I want you to take care of everything within a day.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Chief Wei, if they can help us, we can get rid of Reunion within hours. Wouldn't that minimize our losses?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: That's not important. Lungmen should be able to handle its own problems, once and for all. That is our first principle.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: That is what we need to demonstrate to them. So, everyone, get moving.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Go, Madam Ch'en. It is time to show Reunion some Lungmen hospitality.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Chief Wei, I do have one question. Even if you can't answer right now, I hope you can give me a reasonable guess after everything is over.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You may ask.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: This is supposed to be Reunion's all-out attack. In that case, why has their leader, Talulah, not appeared in Lungmen?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I thought things were progressing smoothly. Why are you frowning, then?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Have we received any response from Ursus?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Still nothing.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: And we still can't get in contact with Speaker Witte?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Unfortunately, our messenger hasn't even been able to meet him.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: By the looks of things, the Ursus Empire is completely opaque.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Fumizuki, I have a premonition. That this whole thing is just the start of something much bigger.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The last time I heard you say that was many years ago.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: When did I say that? I've completely forgotten why I would say something like that.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: That was right after we first met. Are you saying that you've forgotten about everything that's ever happened between us?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: N-no way! How could I! I just can't remember most things apart from our time together.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Nice try, you sweet-talker. Unfortunately, this isn't something you'll be able to forget.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: You said this to my face twenty years ago... that if we lost, this city would be under a different name, and become just another stepping stone on the path to Ursus hegemony.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: If we had lost, you wouldn't be the one sitting here. He would.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Duke of Kashchey.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Alas, poor Tal. Don't you think she reminds us of him?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: But he's already dead.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Killed by Talulah herself.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu
